description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Confederate Scrap-Book. Copied from a scrap-book kept by a young girl during and immediately after the war, with additions from war copies of the “Southern Literary Messenger” and “Illustrated News” ... and other selections, etc" Author: DANIEL, Lizzie Cary. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9605.bbb.19." Page: 218 Place of Publishing: Richmond, Va Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: J. L. Hill Printing Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000860227 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
